text: Mullaitivu District ( ; ) is one of the 25 districts of Sri Lanka. Districts are the second level administrative divisions of the country. The capital of the district is the town of Mullaitivu. Mullaitivu District is in the north east of Sri Lanka. It is part of the Northern Province. It has an area of . ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1978 establishments in Asia Category:Districts of Sri Lanka Category:Northern Province, Sri Lanka Category:1970s establishments in Sri Lanka
